Interface ApplicationScriptDatabaseInitializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationDataSourceScriptDatabaseInitializer, ApplicationR2dbcScriptDatabaseInitializer
@ImportRuntimeHints(org.springframework.boot.sql.autoconfigure.init.SqlInitializationScriptsRuntimeHints.class) public interface ApplicationScriptDatabaseInitializer
Marker interface for a script-based database initializer that initializes the application's database.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Andy Wilkinson, Phillip Webb
